credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Project for a Chimney
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and yellow, red, green, gray and black watercolor, over graphite on paper
description: Elevation of a chimney.  Satyrs without arms are standing upon bases in front of the lateral pillars of the chimney.  The chimney's frieze is decorated with lions with rinceaux as tails.  Below are the plan and the scale (Palmi Romani) of the chimney.
name: Drawing
